item.title: Codewars：The Supermarket Queue
item.description: 有段时间沉迷在codewars刷题，现在趁着有博客了把这道题记录下来 The Supermarket Queue There is a queue for the self-checkout tills at the supermarket. Your task is write a function to calculate the total time required for all the customers to check out! The function has
